## 7. EMPIRICAL GATE (Mandate 2)

### New Rules

Every claim must have:
1. **Metric** ‚Äî A number that can embarrass you
2. **Evidence** ‚Äî Artifact or log proving the number
3. **Confidence** ‚Äî Verified (0.9+) / Supported (0.7-0.9) / Hypothesis (<0.7)

### Example

```
CLAIM: "SEISMIC signal predicts TRV movement"
METRIC: -0.12% average return post-M6 earthquake
EVIDENCE: Backtest on 30-day window (insufficient)
CONFIDENCE: Hypothesis (0.65)
STATUS: Requires 6-month out-of-sample validation
```

---

## 8. CRITICAL PATH TO REAL

### Week 1-2: Validation
- [ ] Paper trade SEISMIC signal for 30 days
- [ ] Track all predictions vs. outcomes
- [ ] Calculate actual hit rate

### Week 3-4: Infrastructure
- [ ] Alpaca paper trading integration
- [ ] Position sizing with Kelly
- [ ] Drawdown limit: 5%

### Week 5-6: Measurement
- [ ] Daily P&L tracking
- [ ] Signal attribution
- [ ] Performance dashboard

### Week 7+: Truth
- [ ] Publish real performance numbers
- [ ] If positive: continue
- [ ] If negative: pivot or kill

> "Echo is a functional data collection system with interesting correlation hypotheses that have not been validated in live markets."
